about_the_game:
Can't get enough of SanctuaryRPG? This Rogue Potato Collection contains...

  • A detailed account of our game development journey in "Rogue Potato: The Making of SanctuaryRPG" eBook written by Yixin and Daniel.
  • A collection of over sixty in-game ASCII art assets, meticulously hand-drawn by our glorious artist Angel.
  • Six early Alpha builds of SanctuaryRPG, including the very first playable prototypes that were iterated on in a cramped college dorm room.
